issue.title: [CF 82] Casting Icon
issue.body:
I'm not sure if this is possible but i guess it should be possible.

Could you please add Target/Focus/...et cetera  <Casting>?

Best with spell Icon, timer, a "kickabel" indicator and the option to only display specific spells (to be super awesome in categorizes like Heals or must_to_be_kicked_evil_boss_spell).


> Posted by CurseForge user Skudnfroodie | Imported from CurseForge issue #82 | Raw
